title: Golden evidence runs for MVP quality baselines
scope: Define and record a small set of golden runs under status/audit for key scenarios (player-only, ball-enabled, BEV-gated).
Store run.json evidence and compact summaries.
Keep evidence retention practical (latest N runs).
acceptance: At least one golden run exists for MVP-0 player-only and is referenced from docs/portal surfaces.
Evidence includes run.json with command, exit code, and timestamps.
Golden summaries are deterministic and comparable across runs.

deliverables.title: Golden run recording script and example evidence layout
acceptance: record_run.mjs is used to capture golden run evidence.
Retention policy remains documented and actionable.

subtasks.title: Record a golden run for MVP-0 and store under status/audit.
done_when: A status/audit/INT-076/runs/<run_id>/run.json exists for a golden scenario.
A compact summary JSON exists for portal display.
